Description:
Hotel de Paris is a charming boutique hotel that offers stylish rooms and a large courtyard garden perfect for enjoying a relaxing meal outdoors. A private bar with an open fireplace is suitable for a night cap.

Rooms and suites at De Paris are luxuriously furnished and offer air-conditioning, a minibar and a work desk. Every room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Private bathroom provides a hairdryer, a bathrobe and free toiletries.

The hotel is situated in the elegant area of the city full of bars and restaurants, and just a few steps away from the main institutions such as Parliament, Palace of Congress, Opera House, Art Gallery and Main Boulevard.

Ironing, laundry and dry cleaning services are available. The reception is open 24 hours a day and breakfast buffet is served each day.

The nearest bus stop is only 50 metres from the property, while the Main Bus Station can be reached in 300 metres. Tirana Airport is 15 km away.

Address: Rruga Kavajes. Kombinat Km 2. Vaqarr VaqarrTirana
Description:
Located in a suburb of Tirana, Hotel Green is just a couple of steps from the national road Tirana-Durres. Surrounded by a garden, the hotel offers an on-site bar and restaurant serving traditional and international dishes.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with shower. Guests can park their car for free on site.

Breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant each day. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and room service is available.

The centre of Tirana is 7.4 km away. The famous Blloku Area, an upmarket part of town known as a shopping destination and entertainment site, can be reached in 3 km. Boutiques, shops, restaurants, trendy bars, pubs, and cafes can be found in abundance.

Main Bus Station is 2 km away, while the Train Station can be reached in 2.3 km. Tirana Airport is 18 km  away.

Description:
Located in a new residential area at the edge of Tirana, the eco-friendly Hotel Viktoria Tirana offers air-conditioned rooms with LCD TV and free Wi-Fi. Free private parking is guarded every night, and a public bus leading to the city centre frequently stops by the hotel.

A restaurant serving Albanian and international dishes and a lounge bar can be found on site. A large garden is also at guests disposal. Hotel Viktoria Tirana is equipped with solar panels for heating water and features various other energy-saving systems.

The biggest shopping centre in Albania is in the immediate vicinity. Numerous restaurants, clubs, wellness centres and a gaming centre with bowling alleys and pool tables are within a 1 km radius and can easily be reached by bus.

Front desk can arrange car rental, as well as airport shuttle service. The centre of Tirana is 5 km away and the Central Bus Station is 6 km away. Please inform Hotel Viktoria Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Hotel Parlamenti is located in the historic centre of Tirana, next to the Albanian Parliament. The Skenderbeg Square and the main promenade can be reached in 5 minutes. The hotel features a bar and dining area where breakfast and lunch are served.

All rooms feature air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms also feature a balcony. Free Wi-Fi is provided.

There is a Chinese restaurant right next to the hotel, as well as a grocery store. A restaurant serving traditional local specialties is located just 100 metres away.

A spacious park with a promenade can be found just a few hundred metres from Parlamenti Hotel. Tennis and football courts can be reached in 5 km. Tabak Bridge can be reached in 2 minutes on foot, while the National Museum is a 5-minute walk away.

The Main Bus Station is 900 metres from the hotel, while the Train Station is 1.4 km away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 15 km.

Description:
Featuring spa and wellness facilities including a swimming pool, gym and massage centre, White Dream Hotel houses a winery and a stylish restaurant. Upon arrival, guests can choose between uniquely designed units which all have free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and an LCD TV.

The modern-style rooms and suites at the White Dream are decorated in different styles and colour schemes. Each unit has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Albanian and international specialities are served at the hotels restaurant, and special dietary needs can be catered for. A wide selection of alcoholic and soft beverages can be tasted at the bar, which also attracts local visitors.

Front desk is attended 24 hours a day and offers room service, as well as dry cleaning and ironing services. Free newspapers are available.

Hotel White Dream is located 4 km from the Skanderbeg Square and provides free private parking. The Adriatic Sea is at a distance of 28 km.

Address: Street Vaso Pasha Bajram Curri1000 Tirana
Description:
Ejna Hotel is located in the popular Blloku District, close to Agimi Cinema and 500 metres from the city centre. Several cultural sights, shops, restaurants and clubs can be found within only 150 metres.
Featuring a multilingual staff, free secured parking and car rental services right in the heart of Tirana, the boutique Hotel Ejna has elegant air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a lively bar with a large garden terrace. Each room has LCD satellite TV, while some of them have a terrace.The HOTEL EJNA is a Tourist hotel. Located in Tirana area. Shopping is accessible by bus/taxi and the nightlife/restaurants are easily accessible by taxi or bus from the hotel.
HotelFacilities: Room Service-Limited Hours Restaurant High Speed Internet Car Parking - Onsite Free Wheelchair Access Bar

Description:
Set 1.9 km from the centre of Tirana, in a business area, Hotel Relax is an elegant hotel reconstructed in 2012. The hotel features a rooftop lounge bar Belvedere that offers unique views of the town and a perfect spot to relax in the evening.

All rooms at Relax Hotel are modernly furnished and air-conditioned. They feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a work desk, a safe and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The en-suite bathrooms feature free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel also features 24 hour front desk service and free camera-surveilled parking. Laundry and ironing service are available, as well as room service. Breakfast is served in the dining room each morning.

Meeting and banquet facilities are available, as well as car rental, and shuttle service can be arranged at a surcharge. The hotel is located in the vicinity of numerous banks and international businesses. The industrial zone and the shopping centre can be reached in 3 km.

Local buses stop right in front of the hotel, while the Main Train Station can be reached in 2 km. Tirana Airport is 10 km away. Please inform Hotel Relax in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Air Albania Stadium

Location : A stay at Mak Albania Hotel places you in the heart of Tirana, steps from Air Albania Stadium and 3 minutes by foot from University of Tirana. This 5-star hotel is 2 mi (3.2 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 151 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : For lunch or dinner, stop by Metropolitan Restaurant, a restaurant that specializes in international cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and 24-hour room service is provided. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee.

Description:
We would like to cordially welcome groups travelers and indipendent visitor to us. Beach Hostel Albion is a great choice to fulfill all of your needs and expectations. The rooms are spacious, in pink nice colour, newly refurbished, have a balcony, a private bathroom and a minibar. Valuable items may be left at reception for storage in our hotel safe. There is a unique micro-brewery attached to the hotel and the beer is very decent, nice can be enjoyed in the bar. Our convivial hotel bar is a great place to meet new friends.
The centre of Durres, the Roman Amphitheatre are 3 km away from the Albion Hotel. The port is 3km from Albion.The aiport is 25 km from Hotel. A bus stop can be found 100 metres away Wi-fi is in the public areas.
Our hotel accepts the following credit cards as payment options: Visa, MasterCard. The hotel's experienced staff looks forward to your stay with us!

HotelFacilities: Hotel

Description:
Situated in Tirana, 8.1 km from Skanderbeg Square, Mai Tai Resort features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 10 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms have a desk.

Guests at Mai Tai Resort can enjoy an Italian breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Greek and Italian cuisine. A vegetarian option can also be requested.

Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 7.3 km from Mai Tai Resort, while Rock of Kavaje is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 20 km from the resort.

Description:
Resort Eklips in Tirana boasts 4-star accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 7 km of Skenderberg Square. Local points of interest like Sky Tower and National Theatre of Opera and Ballet are reachable within 6 km.

At the resort, the rooms come with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Resort Eklips also feature a garden view. The units include a wardrobe.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves a variety of Mediterranean and European dishes and also offers Vegetarian options.

The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day. The accommodation offers a childrens playground.

National Arts Gallery is 6 km from Resort Eklips. Tirana Airport is 20 km from the property. indoor Swimming pool is closed from Wed 31 May 2023 until Sun 15 Oct 2023

Description:
The hotel is conveniently situated in the centre of Berat, overlooking both Berat Castle and the old quarter of Gorica. Osum River is just a half-hour walk or a 4-minute drive away. Places of interest include the Church of St. Mary of Blachernae, which is inside Berat Castle and dates back to the 13th century. Tirana International Airport is about 82 km away.

This small, air-conditioned city hotel has spectacular views and offers 24 rooms. Amenities include a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and a TV lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar and dine in the restaurant. Both wireless Internet access and parking are available. Guests can make use of the laundry services and the hotel also has wheelchair access.

All rooms feature a shower, bath and hairdryer, as well as a double bed, satellite/cable TV, a hifi and Internet access. Additional amenities include a safe, a minibar, a fridge, air conditioning, central heating and a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

Description:
The hotel is located very close to centre of Berat, less than 2 km (about 20 minutes' walk) away. Tirana is 127 km from the hotel. The nearby airport, Kucove Airport, is only 10.8 km away.

The architecture of the hotel is typical of the communist style, surrounded by tall palm trees. Built in 1975, the hotel offers guests 30 years' experience of service and tradition. The view from the terrace on the top floor, overlooking the old Mangalemi and Gorica districts, is spectacular.

The hotel provides convenient accommodation units.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Artificial Lake Park Playground

Location : A stay at Dinasty Hotel places you in the heart of Tirana, within a 10-minute walk of Artificial Lake Park Playground and Grand Park of Tirana. This 4-star hotel is 2 mi (3.2 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads.

Dining : Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel s 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafes. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. For your convenience, a complimentary breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM.

Description:
Golden City Hotel & Spa, Tirana is located in the heart of Tirana, just 300 metres from the main Skandaberg Square and all major sites. This luxuriously decorated hotel features a lounge bar, free Wi-Fi and free parking for all guests.

All rooms come with air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a shower and free toiletries. Breakfast is served each day in the hotel dining room.

Guests can find numerous restaurants just a couple of steps from the Golden City. The famous Blloku neighbourhood offering vivid nightlife and cultural sites can be reached in 1 km.

Within walking distance, guests can find numerous business centres, government offices and embassies and entertainment areas.

The Railway Station can be found 1 km away, while the Main Bus Station is 900 metres away. Tirana Airport can be reached in 10 km.

Description:
Located 500 metres from the Skanderbeg Square, the Brilant Antik Hotel offers individually designed rooms with free Wi-Fi, comfortable bedding and handmade furniture with carved details. The elegant restaurant with fireplace offers traditional Albanian specialities.

Each room comes with satellite TV, a minibar, desk and bathroom with shower and hairdryer.

Front desk of Hotel Brilant Antik is attended 24 hours a day and offers laundry service. A variety of local and international drinks can be sampled at the bar.

Main Bus Station is only 300 metres from the property, same as the National Museum and the Art Gallery. A vibrant area of Tirana with bars, clubs and restaurants is 1 km away.

Tirana Airport is at a distance of 24 km, and pick-up service can be arranged upon request. Please inform Brilant Antik Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. Address: Prane Shkolles Se Policise Sauk Tirana
Description:
Set in Tirana, 4 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Denver offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation features room service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. At Hotel Denver all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

An Italian breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 8 km from Hotel Denver, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa Airport, 17 km from the hotel. Please inform Hotel Denver in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Featuring 3-star accommodation, Hotel Europa is located in Tirana, 700 metres from Skanderbeg Square and 5.5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site.

Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Hotel Europa each room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Europa include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Rinia Park and House of Leaves. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Description:
Iliria Boutique Hotel features elegantly decorated accommodation with air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Located in a stylish district of Tirana, the hotel is within a walking distance from several restaurants and diplomatic institutions. Free private parking is provided.

All accommodation units have a desk and a seating area. The private bathroom comes with shower.

A selection of Albanian dishes can be sampled in the hotels restaurant. Guests can relax and have a drink on the terrace.

Iliria Hotel front desk operates 24 hours a day and provides room service. Dry cleaning and ironing services are available.

Iliria Boutique Hotel is steps away from the biggest park in the city. The centre of Tirana and the Main Bus and Train Station are 1 km from the hotel. Tirana Airport is 15 km away. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description: This bright and modern establishment is conveniently located near the centre of Albania's capital city, Tirana. The functional hotel offers bright air-conditioned rooms with wireless Internet connection. Guests can relax with a coffee at the hotel bar or savour traditional Albanian cuisine at the on-site restaurant. The property lies within a fifteen-minute walk from the centre of Tirana and provides free private parking on site. Less than 2 km away is the upmarket Blloku District, widely known as an entertainment and shopping destination with its many boutiques, shops, restaurants, trendy bars and cafes. From this hotel, guests can also easily explore Tirana's rich mosaic of historic and natural landmarks, including castles, mosques, cathedral, many museums, canyons and waterfalls. The international airport is just 20 minutes' drive from the hotel.

Description:
Set in the very centre of Tirana, just a short walk from Skenderberg Square, SarOtel offers an on-site bar, a common terrace free WiFi and secured parking.

Each room at the SarOtel is modernly furnished and well-lit. They all feature a flat-screen TV, air-conditioning, a minibar and a desk and chair. Private bathroom provides a shower. Most rooms also offer a balcony.

Breakfast is provided daily and includes local dishes or gluten-free food. On-site sauna and hammam are available at no additional cost for hotel guests. The hotel also offers a business conference room.

Various night clubs can be found close to the hotel, while tourist agencies that organise trips are located close by. The Albanian National Museum is 150 metres away. Guests can also visit the Fine Arts Gallery and the Petrela and Preza Castles, just a short walk away.

Local buses stop 100 metres from the hotel, while the Main Train Station is 600 metres away. Tirana Airport is 18 km away. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property adheres to strict physical distancing measures.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Selman Stermasi Stadium

Location : A stay at Classic Hotel places you in the heart of Tirana, within a 15-minute walk of Selman Stermasi Stadium and Former Residence of Enver Hoxha. This 4-star hotel is 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1.2 mi (1.9 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 14 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Classic Restaurant, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Description:
Hotel Vila 60 is located 350 metres from the centre of Tirana. It offers free Wi-Fi, free parking and air-conditioned rooms.

Brightly designed and featuring wooden decorations, all rooms have a flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and desk. The private bathroom comes with shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The reception is open 24 hours a day and provides laundry and ironing services. Breakfast is buffet style, while the restaurant menu includes specialities from international and local culinary traditions. Guests can relax in the hotels courtyard garden.

Various restarants, bars, a gym and a local bus stop are in the immediate vicinity. Tirana International Airport is 11 km away, and a pick-up service can be organised upon request.

Description:
The luxurious Xheko Imperial Hotel boasts a location in the very centre of Tirana, close to the big park. The Carlsberg Restaurant serves Albanian and Italian specialties and features a rooftop terrace, while the wine bar offers a wide selection of local wines.

Accommodation units are lavishly furnished with all modern amenities and luxuries. They all feature air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a safe and French balconies. Bathrooms feature free toiletries, bathrobe and slippers and a hairdryer. A complimentary bottle of water and fresh fruit are a welcome gift for each guest.

The hotel provides luxurious setting and stylish and modern facilities such as free Wi-Fi and ironing/dry cleaning service, parking facilities and 24-hour reception and room service.

The main city square can be reached in a 10-minute walk. The front desk staff will gladly assist the guests in organising excursions, day trips and sightseeing. Shuttle service can be arranged against a surcharge.

Main Bus and Train Stations can be reached in 6 km, while the local buses stop 500 metres away. Tirana Airport is located 29 km away.

Description:
Vila Belvedere is set in the popular beach area of Shkembi Kavajes, 6 km from the centre of Durres. Featuring free Wi-Fi and a restaurant serving Albanian cuisine, it offers an outdoor pool, a sauna and a gym.

The interior of this elegant hotel is decorated in traditional Italian style. All accommodation units comprise air conditioning, TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom.

The nearest beach is 100 metres away. Durres Ampitheatre, the largest Roman amphitheatre in the Balkans, is in the city centre. Tirana Airport is 35 km from the Belvedere. Please inform Vila Belvedere in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Located in the centre of Tirana, 1 km from the Skanderbeg Square and other sights, Hotel Villa Tafaj offers air-conditioned rooms and an on-site a-la-carte restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

All rooms come with cable TV, a minibar and a work desk. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and towels.

Villa Tafaj Hotel runs a 24-hour front desk and offers an on-site bar, restaurant and meeting facilities. The National History Museum is 500 metres away and the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet and the Palace of Culture are approximately 1 km from the property.

A public bus stop is 200 metres away and the Main Bus Station is located at a distance of 1 km. Tirana Airport is 17 km from the property. Car parking is available with extra charge. Reservation is needed. Please inform Hotel Villa Tafaj in advance of your expected arrival time. The stylish 4-star Sky Hotel Tirana is located a 10-minute walk from the major government institutions and from Skanderberg Square. It offers panoramic views over Tirana and free parking on site.

Each room is air-conditioned and comes with soft carpets, flat-screen TVs with cable and satellite channels and a bathroom equipped with bathrobes and slippers. Free Wi-fi is available in the entire hotel.

Description:

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 26 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Description:
Hotel Berati is located in the historical centre of Berati, just a few minutes away from all major attractions. It offers a restaurant and bar that serves traditional meals, while free Wi-Fi and free parking are included.

Rooms are air-conditioned and fitted with simple furnishings, satellite TV and a wardrobe. Private bathroom provides a shower. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available upon request.

The closest supermarket can be found 20 metres away. Historic sights such as the Old Town and the The Lead Mosque can be reached in a 2-minute walk. The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be found 500 metres away.

Guests can also find the Tomorri National Park 60 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Berati Hotel. Local buses stop just a few steps away, while Tirana and the international airport are 110 km from the property. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description: The hotel is established only a few meters from the centre of Tirana. It is the ideal place for visitors who are business dealers as well as for those who want to visit capital city. Offers service in Bar & Restaurant with a very rich cuisine, where all the dishes are prepared with fresh and premium ingredients. Here you will find restaurant where you can enjoy special dishes of the Italian cuisine and traditional Albanian cuisine, accompanied with wines of quality. All the rooms are furnished with style.

Description:
One of the coziest hotels in Tirana, built in 1999. Location: 5 minutes walking distance from the Grand Park with the artificial lake and the famous lively "Bllok" Area with its posh coffee shops, pubs and restaurants. Located in Tirana, Hotel Palma is a 19-minute walk from the National Arts Gallery. The hotel offers free WiFi access, a 24-hour front desk and shared living area with a TV. Free breakfast can be enjoyed on site.

All rooms feature air conditioning, a balcony and cable TV. The bathroom is complete with a bath, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

Vending machines for snacks and drinks are available at the reception area. The breakfast room features tiled floors.

Hotel Palma is 1.3 km from Skenderberg Square and 1.4 km from the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet. Tirana Airport is 14 km away. Please inform Hotel Palma in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Set in Elbasan, Grand Hotel features a restaurant, bar, terrace, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. The units feature a wardrobe.

Guests at Grand Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa Airport, 46 km from Grand Hotel. Please inform Grand Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Located 1.5 km from the Skenderbeg Square in the centre of Tirana, Vila Verde Rooms provides accommodation. A snack bar is located on site. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms here come with a telephone and a TV. Some have a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, while others have a shared bathroom and toilet at their disposal. Most rooms are air-conditioned.

A 24-hour front desk is available at the property, as is luggage storage. The Mother Theresa Hospital is only 200 metres away from Vila Verde Rooms.

The National Arts Gallery is 1.8 km away from the property. Tirana International Airport is located at a distance of 17 km.

Description: Hotel Firenze is located in the center of Tirana, is a high standard hotel established in 2003 and has a strong reputation for comfort, cleanliness and service. The rooms are equipped with air conditioner, bathroom, minibar, TV, direct telephone, internet connection and hairdryer. Some of the rooms have balconies looking over the main boulevard, providing a great spot to watch Tirana's motions. The hotel has a restaurant, which offers Albanian and Italian cuisine and a rich buffet breakfast. Moreover the hotel has the Konferenceper room equipped which all the necessary for meetings and conferences, for business travelers.

Description:
Situated in Tirana, this hotel is within a 15-minute walk of Tanners' Bridge and Tirana Parliament. Statue of the Unknown Partisan and Fortress of Justinian are also within 1 mi (2 km).
This hotel features a fitness center, a bar/lounge, and a sauna. Additionally, self parking, free newspapers, and multilingual staff are onsite.
This hotel has 50 rooms.The GKAM HOTEL is a  hotel. Located in Tirana area.
HotelFacilities: Air conditioning Elevators Multilingual staff

Description:
Hotel Aleksiona is set on the Koder Arapaj Hill in Durres. Featuring free wi-Fi and free parking, it offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant.

All rooms provide a balcony and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower. Guests can also relax in the garden with a terrace.

The nearest beach is 1.5 km, while the centre of  Durres is 2.5 km away. A bus stop is at a distance of 350 metres. Tirana International Airport is 25 km away, while the capital of Tirana is 35 km from the Aleksiona.

Address: Rr. E Elbasanit 81 Tirana Albania 81 Tirana
Description:
Surrounded by greenery and positioned just a 10-minute walk from Skandaberg Square and a 5-minute walk from the main boulevard, Hotel Sokrat features modern and colourful rooms with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Guests can make use of free parking.

All rooms at the Sokrat Hotel feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a bathroom equipped with a shower, towels, toiletries and slippers. Each room is decorated in soft colours and features modern furniture.

A rich buffet breakfast is served each day at the Sokrat Hotel. A snack bar is open all day and features a rich selection of coffee and tea. The nearest restaurant can be reached in just a few steps and serves Italian and Albanian specialties and international cuisine. An ATM is located right next to the hotel building.

Just a 5-minute walk from Hotel Sokrat, guests can find Blloku neighbourhood famous for its restaurants, bars, nightlife and shopping. The centre of Tirana can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

Local buses stop 200 metres from the Sokrat, while Tirana Airport can be found 20 km away.

Description:
Located about 500 metres from Tiranas central Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Livia features an elegant restaurant with a large garden terrace, while its air-conditioned rooms come with TV. Free Wi-Fi is provided at the reception area.

A desk and a private bathroom with shower are standard facilities in all rooms. At the Hotel Livias restaurant guests can sample some domestic and international dishes and enjoy a variety of wines.

Livia Hotel is right on the vibrant Qemal Stafa Street. It is within a 10-minute walk from the 18th-century Tanners Bridge, Palace of Culture, Tirana Clock Tower and the Ethem Bey Mosque.

Main Train Station is 1.2 km away, while Tirana Airport is at a distance of 15 km.

Description:
Enjoying a green surrounding of pine trees just 40 metres from the sea, the Marea Resort has a private beach area with a large playground and a swimming pool. It offers elegant air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and an LCD satellite TV.

Free sun loungers and parasols are available by the pool and on the beach. Free private parking is provided on site.

The Marea Resort is on a quiet location outside Kavaja, where a number of resorts and private beaches are located. The city centre is 5 km away.

Mother Teresa Airport is at a distance of 27 km, while the capital city of Tirana is 37 km away along the SH2 Motorway. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Please inform Marea Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant serving traditional Albanian and Italian cuisine, Hotel Villa Fernando Tirana offers spacious and comfortable rooms with vintage furnishings. Skenderberg Square is 1.5 km away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and comprise a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Some rooms include a furnished balcony.

The Boutique Villa Fernando runs a 24-hour front desk, and offers an aperitif bar and a snack bar and a lounge area with a large TV. Breakfast is served buffet style on site.

Tirana Old Town, the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet and the National Arts Gallery can all be found within 1.5 km distance.

The public bus stops right in front of the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 1 km from the Villa Fernando. Tirana Airport is 13 km away and airport shuttle service is available at a surcharge. Please inform Hotel Villa Fernando Tirana in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

Description:
Offering a restaurant, Hotel Comfort offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi in the centre of Tirana. Free private parking is available upon previous request.

Each room here will provide you with satellite TV  and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a shower, a bidet and free toiletries.

At Hotel Comfort you will find a 24-hour front desk  and a snack bar. The hotel is 600 metres away from the central Skenderberg Square, 1 km away from the National Arts Gallery and 1.2 km from Vodafone Tower. Tirana Airport is 17 km away.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Unknown Partisan monument

Location : Located in Kashar, Te Stela Resort is connected to the convention center, within a 5-minute drive of Skenderbeg Castle and Unknown Partisan monument. This 4-star hotel is 4.8 mi (7.7 km) from Ministry of Defense and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel s room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM.

  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds
  • This property accepts credit cards
  • Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit

Special Instructions : Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Artificial Lake Park Playground

Location : With a stay at VH Broadway Tirana Hotel in Tirana, you ll be connected to the convention center, just a 3-minute walk from Selman Stermasi Stadium and 8 minutes by foot from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha. This family-friendly hotel is 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Ministry of Defense and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Skanderbeg Square.

Rooms : Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 19 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and indoor private spa tubs. Your memory foam bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Kitchens are outfitted with espresso makers. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while iPod docking stations and cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Dining : All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Noise-free guestrooms cannot be guaranteed
  • Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, a first aid kit, and window guards

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. If you are planning to arrive after 1:00 AM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Address: Rr. Nacionale Golem Kavaje Zona GolemKavaja Zona
Description:
Located in Golem, 150 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Hotel Pishat e Buta provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony. Hotel Pishat e Buta offers certain rooms that include pool views, and each room has a private bathroom and a desk. Guest rooms at the accommodation feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Hotel Pishat e Buta.

You can play tennis at the hotel.

Golem Beach is less than 1 km from Hotel Pishat e Buta, while Qerret Beach is a 15-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 43 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Featuring free Wi-Fi, Hotel Oresti Center is set in the centre of Tirana, just 50 metres from the Skanderbeg Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms and a garden with a seating area.

All rooms comprise an LCD TV with satellite channels and a fridge. Most units have a balcony, while each provides a private bathroom with a shower.

Various shops, restaurants and bars are a short walk away. National History Museum is 100 metres away. A bus station is 200 metres away, while Tirana Airport is 15 km from the Oresti.

Description:
Located 500 metres from the vibrant Blloku area filled with restaurants, bars and night clubs, Bristol Hotel Tirana offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and free WiFi. Guests can relax at the hotel bar.

The rooms all have a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Breakfast is served buffet style.

Supermarkets, shops and some restaurants can be found in the nearest vicinity of the hotel. Public buses stop 400 metres from the hotel.

Skanderbeg Square is about 800 metres away, while the National Museum is within 1 km. Tiranas main park and its lake are about 2.5 km away.

Mother Theresa International Airport is 19 km from the Bristol Hotel, which offers airport transfer service upon request.

Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi and free parking, Sky 2 Hotel Tirana is set in the heart of Tirana just 200 metres from the Main Square. It features air-conditioned accommodation and a restaurant serving authentic regional and international dishes.

Decorated in beige colours, all rooms are fitted with an LCD satellite TV, a minibar and a fridge. The private bathroom comes with shower, hairdryer, towels and free toiletries.

We provide continental buffet breakfast. Guests can also relax in an on-site lounge bar. The nearest night club is just 50 metres away.

Within 200 metres from the hotel, you can visit the Opera House, the National Theatre and the National Historic Museum. Shopping streets can be found all around the area.

The nearest bus station is 50 metres away. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 18 km and shuttle service can be organised upon request.

Description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant, Hotel Muzaka is right next to the river Osum and 500 metres from the centre of Berat. Set in a traditional building, it offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The UNESCO-listed Berat Castle is 1.5 km away.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms are decorated with wooden beams.

At Hotel Muzakas restaurant guests can enjoy their breakfast and Italian cuisine. A terrace and a bar are also available.

The nearest grocery store and a bus station are 500 metres away. Excursions to Bogova Waterfall, Tomor Mountain and rafting on Osum River can be arranged in local agencies. Free on-site parking is provided.

Address: Perroi Zaranika Rruga Kadri Hoxha3001 Elbasan
Description:
Located in Elbasan, 39 km from Skanderbeg Square, Imperial Hotel IH provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within 42 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units at Imperial Hotel IH include air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Continental and halal breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation.

You can play billiards at Imperial Hotel IH, and car hire is available.

Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 39 km from the hotel, while Grand Park of Tirana is 39 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 52 km from Imperial Hotel IH. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Univers Resort features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Elbasan. This 4-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids club and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel each room has air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a mountain view. At Univers Resort every room is fitted with a seating area.

A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground.

Skanderbeg Square is 41 km from Univers Resort, while Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 44 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 54 km from the hotel.

Description: This hotel enjoys a great setting at the heart of Konjat, in Albania. Guests will find themselves within easy access of a number of attractions in the area, and can explore and experience the rich, vibrant culture of the country. The hotel lies in close proximity to a host of shopping, dining and entertainment venues. This wonderful hotel features a charming design. The guest rooms are superbly appointed, featuring modern amenities for added comfort and convenience. Guests will experience first-class hospitality at this hotel, and are invited to enjoy the many facilities and services that it has to offer.

Description:
Located in the heart of Tirana, Hotel 3A is set just a couple of steps from Skenderbeg Square and numerous shops, restaurants and bars. A cafe bar and a beauty salon are available on site. The hotel also features free Wi-Fi and free parking.

Rooms are colourfully furnished with carpeted floors. All of them feature air-conditioning, a desk, a TV and a minibar. Private bathroom provides a shower.

Laundry and ironing service is also available at the 3A Hotel. An ATM machine and foreign currency exchange can also be found on site. Continental breakfast served in the cafe area on the ground floor.

Guests can find numerous restaurants and bars within a 100-metre radius. Nearest grocery store is just 20 metres away. The famous Blloku area, cultural and entertainment centre of Tirana, can be reached in just 1 km.

The Qemal Stafa stadium and shopping centre can be reached in a 15 minute drive. Main Train and Bus Station can be reached in a 5-minute drive. Please inform Hotel 3A in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Star Hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV on a central location in Tirana, 20 metres from the Opera and steps away from the Skanderbeg Square.

Decorated in light tones of orange, the rooms all have a desk or table with chairs. Each room is equipped with a minibar and a private bathroom with shower.

You can shop for groceries and dine at restaurants in close proximity to the hotel, while the nearest clubs are 400 metres away. Tiranas most attractive sights are all within walking distance.

Local buses stop next to the hotel. There is a shopping centre 100 metres from the hotel.

The bus station is 500 metres away, and the airport is at a distance of 17 km.

Description:
Situated right on the sea coast of Durres and near all major sites, Hotel Ani offers air-conditioned rooms and unique views of the Adriatic sea. It features an a-la-carte restaurant and a bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property.
All rooms are brightly furnished and offer a flat-screen TV, a phone and a private bathroom. Some rooms feature a spa bath, while some are fitted with a shower.
The hotel also features a conference room, while the restaurant offers a rich menu featuring Italian, French and traditional Albanian cuisine. The restaurant also offers a terrace, while the front desk is open 24 hours a day. Parking is also offered. The guests can either enjoy a walk along the seaside or visit the historical sites like Amphitheater and Archaeology museum. Hotel Ani is located right next to the sandy beach strip that stretches over 20 km. The city of Tirana can be reached in 35 km, while Tirana Airport is 20 km away.The HOTEL ANI is a  hotel. Located in DURRES area.

Description:
Providing free Wi-Fi and free private parking next to an artificial lake, Hotel Restaurant Dreri offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs and minibars, while its gastronomical offer includes Albanian, Italian and international dishes.

Guests can relax with a drink on the hotel terrace. There is a grocery shop next door.

Tirana centre is a 7-minute car drive from the Dreri Restaurant Hotel.  There you can find the National History Museum and the Archeological Museum, as well as some art galleries and the historic fortresses of Petrela and Preza.

Description:
Located 10 km from the centre of Durres, Hotel Whispers is set just 30 metres from a pebbly beach. It offers a private beach area with sun loungers and parasols, an on-site bar and restaurant, as well as free Wi-Fi and free parking.

All accommodation units offer a seating area with cable TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area and a balcony. Private bathroom provides a shower. The units are air-conditioned and feature a view of the sea.

The bar and restaurant have a spacious terrace and serve a variety of drinks and Italian and Albanian specialties. There is also a supermarket just a few steps from the hotel.

Local buses stop 15 metres away, while the Bus Station, with lines to Tirana and Saranda, can be found 600 metres away. Tirana Airport is 30 kilometres away.

Description:
Only steps away from a sandy beach and 10 km from the centre of Durres, Hotel Adriatik 2 offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. It features an on-site bar and restaurant with a summer terrace. Free private parking is available on site.

All rooms include a minibar and a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms have balconies overlooking the sea.

The on-site restaurant offers Mediterranean, Albanian and traditional cuisine. A grocery shop can be found 100 metres away.

The National Archaeological Museum can be found in the centre of Durres. Durres Amphitheatre, built during emperor Trajans reign, is 10 km away. The Cape of Rodon, with the historic Rodoni Castle is about 50 km from the Adriatik 2 Hotel.

A bus stop is right in front of the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 5 km away. Durres Ferry Port with lines to Bari and Ancona is 10 km from the property. Tirana Airport is 40 km away.

Description: This hotel enjoys a wonderful setting in Elbasan, on the Shkumbin River bank. Guests will find themselves just a short distance away from Elbasan centre, which offers a host of attractions. The hotel is located just a short distance away from the Ethnographic Museum. The Main Bus Station is also located in the town centre, within easy access of the hotel. Guests can also explore the magnificent Dajti National Park, which is just 20 km away. The hotel features an elegant design, immersing visitors in style and charm. The guest rooms are beautifully appointed, offering comfort and convenience, in a relaxed setting. The rustic elegance that the hotel exudes is sure to impress. Guests will be pleased by the many exemplary facilities and services that the hotel has to offer.

Description:
Located just next to the Tirana International Airport, Hotel Jurgen offers an on-site Italian restaurant with a spacious terrace. Free Wi-Fi access is available.

The rooms are air-conditioned and provide a flat-screen TV. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a desk.

Jurgen Hotel runs a 24-hour front desk and features a garden and an on-site bar. A bus that links the airport with the centre of Tirana stops 25 metres away. Tirana centre is 15 km from the property. Free private parking is provided.

All the rooms are air-conditioned and come with a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Breakfast is included in the room rate.

Hotel Colombo runs a 24-hour front desk and offers an on-site bar. A childrens playground and free private parking are also available.

The centre of Elbasan is located at a distance of 5 km. Shebenik-Jablanice National Park is 30 km away and Lake Ohrid is approximately 50 km from the Colombo.

Description:
Hotel Klea is in the Castle of Berat, just 40 meters from the main gate. Set in a traditional house, it offers free WiFi access in public areas and a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace.

All rooms include air conditioning, a TV and a desk as well as a bathroom with a bathtub and a shower.

The on-site restaurant of Hotel Klea serves traditional homemade dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include grocery deliveries, a shared lounge and a tour desk.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking. Free private parking is available on site and Tirana Airport is 81 km away.

Description:
Hotel Belgrad Mangalem is located in Berat, just a 5-minute walk from the Old Town and the The Lead Mosque. The hotel features an on-site bar, while free WiFi is available throughout.

Each room here will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the room.

Hotel Belgrad Mangalem is housed in 2 historical buildings, placed 10 metres from each other. You will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage.

The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be reached in just 500 metres. Guests can also visit the Tomorri National Park, 22 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Hotel Belgrad.

The property offers free parking. Tirana Airport is 82 km away. Please inform Hotel Belgrad Mangalem in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

There is also a refrigerator.

Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and a bidet. You can enjoy mountain view and garden view from the room. Extras include pay-per-view channels and cable channels.

At Grand White City Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and barbecue facilities. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, luggage storage and a kids club.

Tirana Airport is 80 km away. The property offers free parking.

Rooms here come equipped with a flat-screen cable and satellite TV. The private bathrooms are fitted with a shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. Free toiletries and slippers are available. Each room offers a view of the garden.

Relax City Center Hotel also comprises a restaurant located only 30 metres away from the main building. A garden is at the guests disposal, as is a bar. Free private parking is provided on site.

Description:
Hotel Kaceli features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Berat. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Free private parking is available and the hotel also offers a shuttle service for guests who want to explore the surrounding area.

The rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. All rooms come with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Hotel Kaceli have a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 115 km from Hotel Kaceli.

Set in Elbasan, 40 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Guri offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is situated 43 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, 40 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha and 40 km from Grand Park of Tirana. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. The units feature a wardrobe.

An Italian breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Guri.

Hotel Bar Restorant Le Olive is located about 1 km from the centre of Elbasan. The on-site bar and restaurant serves international and traditional Albanian food and features a terrace. Free Wi-Fi and parking are provided.

All rooms offer a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. It also offers a desk and chair, while the private bathroom provides a shower.

There is a grocery store 150 metres away, while numerous other bars and restaurants can be reached in 400 metres. The tourist agency in the centre offers excursions to Durres and Saranda, as well as car rentals.

The centre of Elbasan features an Etnographic Museum, as well as the Basilic in Tepe of Elbasan. Local buses stop 150 metres from the hotel, while the Main Bus Station is 1 km away. Tirana International Airport is 30 km away.

Description:
HeadLine : In Velipoje

Location : With a stay at Hotel Valz in Velipoje, you ll be 29.8 mi (48 km) from Kune Beach and 30.6 mi (49.3 km) from Rana e Hedhun. This hotel is within the region of Velika Plaza Beach and Mother Theresa statue.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel s room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 9:30 AM.

  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property

Description:
Nestled in a renovated historic building in the centre of Tirana, Hotel Vila Kerciku offers colourfully furnished modern rooms and a breakfast hall. There is also a snack bar on site. Free WiFi is available.

All rooms offer air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, a wardrobe and a modern bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The balconies overlook the Avni Rustemi Square.

Room service is available, while the front desk is open 24 hours a day. Breakfast is served each day in the dining hall.

There is a restaurant serving traditional specialties just a few steps from the Vila Kerciku. Skanderbeg Square, Clock Tower of Tirana and Ethem Bey Mosque can be reached in 500 metres. Numerous museums, shops and cafes can be found all around the neighbourhood.

There are a bus stop and taxi stand right in front of the hotel. Tirana Airport is 15 km away. Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Description:
Located 2.5 km from Tirana city centre, Hotel Eliza offers a garden, terrace and bar. The hotel is 2.2 km from Skenderberg Square, 2.1 km from the Vodafone Tower and 2.1 km from the National Arts Gallery.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, desk and wardrobe, while one also has a balcony. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower.

A continental or full English breakfast is provided each morning at Hotel Eliza. Guests can also relax with a drink in the bar. Restaurants are located within walking distance of the property.

Additional features include free WiFi access throughout and free public parking is possible on site. Tirana Airport is 12 km away and luggage storage is available at the accommodation. Please inform Hotel Eliza in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Set in Golem, 600 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Hotel Onufri offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel.

Golem Beach is 1.4 km from Hotel Onufri, while Qerret Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 41 km from the accommodation.

Description:
SUNSHINE HOTEL is a family hotel located next to the sea in Shkembi i Kavajes, 5 minutes south of Durres city. 
All the rooms offer fantastic view over the sea.
We offer in our price one umbrella and 2 sunbeds on the beach for all the rooms. Set on the beachfront in Shkallnur, Sunshine Hotel Durres offers air-conditioned rooms that feature a furnished balcony with sea views. Free WiFi access is available.

All rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and a wardrobe. Each unit comprises a private bathroom fitted with a shower that also includes a bathrobe, bidet and hairdryer.

Durres Sunshine Hotel runs a 24-hour front desk and also offers an on-site bar and a garden. Free private parking is also available on site.

The centre of Durres is 10 km away, while the Durres Amphitheatre is some 11 km from the property. Tirana Airport is located at a distance of 38 km away. Swimming pool is closed from Wed 01 May 2019 until Mon 30 Sept 2019

Description: This property is beautifully located at the heart of Tirana. The hotel lies close to many of the city's most prominent attractions. The centre of the city is just a 2 minutes' walking distance away. The property is located within easy access of many places of interest, including the National Library and the National Museum and Theatre. A wealth of shopping, dining and entertainment venues can be found nearby. Links to the public transport network can be found close to the property. The property comprises beautifully-designed guest rooms, which are well equipped with modern amenities. Guests can sit back on the terrace, with a refreshing cocktail, and admire the stunning city views.

Description:
Situated in Tirana, within 1.2 km of Skanderbeg Square and 6 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, Lugano Hotel features accommodation with a terrace and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk and a TV. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Speaking English and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Lugano Hotel include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and National Museum of History Albania. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Featuring a bar, shared lounge, garden and free WiFi, Hotel Rex is set in Tirana, 1.1 km from Skanderbeg Square and 5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The property is situated 2.8 km from National Sport Park Resort, 1.1 km from Rinia Park and 1.2 km from Ethem Bey Mosque. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, slippers and a hairdryer. At Hotel Rex rooms have bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rex include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and National Museum of History Albania. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa, 13 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
The elegant Hotel Opera is set in Tirana and features an on-site restaurant and free WiFi available throughout the property. The hotel is just steps away from Skenderberg Square and from the the National Museum and the National Theatre of Opera and Ballet.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Opera Hotel also offers a meeting and conference room fitted with state of the art equipment.

Just steps away you will find the Tirana Municipal Hall, the Ministries Square and business centres. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 13 km from Hotel Opera. Located in Berat, Hotel Kalaja offers 3-star accommodation with a bar. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service.

At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. At Hotel Kalaja every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Guests at Hotel Kalaja will be able to enjoy activities in and around Berat, like cycling.

Description:
Opened in 2010, this modern hotel is 4 km from the centre of Tirana. It offers free Wi-Fi and spacious rooms with air conditioning and LCD satellite TVs.

All rooms at the Prince Hotel feature a minibar and a bathroom with hairdryer.

The restaurant serves Albanian and international cuisine. Guests can relax in the bar and on the terrace. Room service is also available.

Description:
Natea Apartments features rooms with free WiFi in Tirana, well located 500 metres from Skanderbeg Square. The property is located 5 km from Dajti Express. Local points of interest like Sky Tower and National Sport Park are reachable within less than 1 km and 5 km, respectively.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet. Guest rooms feature a desk.

Natea Apartments offers a terrace.

National Theatre of Opera and Ballet is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while National Arts Gallery is 1.6 km from the property. Description:
Set in Tirana, 5.2 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Akropoli offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 8.5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, 6.2 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha and 40 km from Rock of Kavaje. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bidet. Hotel Akropoli provides some units with city views, and all rooms have a balcony.

The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options.

Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling.

National Museum of History Albania is 4.4 km from the accommodation, while House of Leaves is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 11 km from Hotel Akropoli.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area for your convenience. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. Private parking is available at the hotel.

You will find a shared lounge at the property. The hotel is located in the Block Area that abounds with some of the best bars and restaurants in Tirana.

Description:
Located in Elbasan, 40 km from Skanderbeg Square, Real Scampis Hotel provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. Real Scampis Hotel offers certain rooms with garden views, and each room comes with a balcony. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

At Real Scampis Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Pizza cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested.

The hotel offers a childrens playground.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 43 km from Real Scampis Hotel, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 40 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 53 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Located about 3 km from the centrally located Skanderbeg Square in Tirana, Alen Bar Hotel offers an on-site bar with a garden terrace. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.

All rooms come with a TV and a seating area. Each one is equipped with a private bathroom featuring a bath or shower and a bidet.

Hotel Alen Bar runs a 24-hour front desk where guests can also arrange car hire. Tirana Airport is 23 km away.

Description:
Located in Tirana, 1.2 km from Skanderbeg Square, Hotel Rosa Blu provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a bar and a spa and wellness centre. The hotel features an indoor pool, sauna, evening entertainment and room service.

All units will provide guests with a fridge.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options.

The hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub.

Speaking both English and Italian, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Rosa Blu include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and Rinia Park. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Description:
Enjoying a quiet location of a residential area in Tirana, Hotel Queen is located 10-minutes drive from the city centre and Skenderberg Square. Guests can enjoy a mountain view from the terrace and free WiFi available in the entire hotel.

All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a bath and a bidet. For extra comfort, there are bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels is provided as well.

Queen Hotel offers free taxi service from Tirana Airoprt to the city centre and back to the hotel for up to 4 people. Free guided tours of Tirana are offered by the property.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and a breakfast in bed option available. Private parking is available on site.

Sky Tower is 1.7 km from Hotel Queen, while National Arts Gallery can be reached within 2.2 km.

Tirana Airport is 17 km from Hotel Queen.

Description: Hotel Dafina is a popular choice amongst travelers in Tirana, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour security, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, private check in/check out, Wi-Fi in public areas, laundry service, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as cleaning products, clothes rack, linens, mirror, slippers. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Tirana has to offer by making Hotel Dafina your base.

Description:
Located in Tirana, 7.3 km from Skanderbeg Square, HOTEL ARANDI AG provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 11 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car and 6.5 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, the property features a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. At HOTEL ARANDI AG each room includes bed linen and towels.

An Italian breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Rock of Kavaje is 48 km from HOTEL ARANDI AG, while Bektashi World Centre is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

Description:
Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and a restaurant, Fafa Premium Hotel is situated on a beachfront location in Golem, 27 km from Tirana. Free private parking is available on site.

The rooms are air-conditioned and come with a flat-screen TV. All units have a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Fafa Premium Hotel features free WiFi .

There is a 24-hour front desk and shops at the property. Guests can relax on the sun terrace or have a drink at the on-site bar.

You can play table tennis at the hotel. Tirana Airport is 26 km from the property. Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request and at a surcharge. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Description:
Situated in Golem, 100 metres from Mali I Robit Beach, Kolaveri Resort features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 3-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a garden.

At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms at Kolaveri Resort are fitted with a TV with cable channels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast.

Qerret Beach is less than 1 km from Kolaveri Resort, while Golem Beach is a 14-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 43 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Please inform Kolaveri Resort in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description: Establishment has a superb location on Old Bazaar. Right in the heart of Skopje, the largest bazaar in the Balkans outside Istanbul. It is situated on the eastern bank of the Vardar River, stretching from the Stone Bridge to the Bit-Pazar and from the Skopje Fortress to the Serava river. Is the perfect base for exploring the city and all it has to offer, located near to the Skanderbeg Square, only 0.5 km from Macedonia Square, the main square in Skopje hotel provided great elegant guest rooms with modern and comfortable design. With capacity of 24 beds, a breakfast room and a private parking,  has an excellent team of professionals who strive to make the stay at the hotel very pleasant and comfortable.,

Description: Set in a prime location of Lezhe, Europa Park Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. 24-hour security, private check in/check out, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are there for guest's enjoyment. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer carpeting, cleaning products, clothes rack, linens, mirror to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Lezhe has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Europa Park Hotel.

Dining : Stop by the hotel s restaurant for lunch or dinner, or grab snacks at the coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10:30 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards

Special Instructions : Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Located in the centre of Tirana, 900 metres from Skanderbeg Square, Destil Hostel offers a restaurant, a 24-hour reception, free WiFi access, a library, and a nightclub. Guests can use lockers and a shared kitchen.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms feature a seating area and bathroom.

Free public parking is available on site.

Description:
Located in Tirana, 2 km from Skanderbeg Square, Orchidea Hotel provides accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a business centre. The air-conditioned rooms provide a garden view and come with a desk and free WiFi.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a bidet. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.

Guests at Orchidea Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The accommodation offers a childrens playground.

Description: Set in a prime location of Shengjin, Hotel Iliria puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are just some of the facilities on offer. Closet, cleaning products, towels, clothes rack, slippers can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's private beach, children's playground, kids club will further enhance your satisfying stay. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Shengjin, Hotel Iliria will make you feel instantly at home.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Pyramid of Tirana and Rinia Park. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 15 km from Hotel Piemonte.
