Description:
Guest House Xhuljon features river views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Berat.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with hot tub and free toiletries. A balcony with garden views is offered in every unit.

Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast.

A terrace can be found at Guest House Xhuljon, along with a garden.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 118 km from the accommodation.

Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Description:
Set in Tirana, 19 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, Hotel Panorama Dajt offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation provides room service and free shuttle service for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony with a city view. Each room includes a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Hotel Panorama Dajt have a patio. All guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Hotel Panorama Dajt offers a childrens playground.

Skanderbeg Square is 22 km from the hotel, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 36 km from Hotel Panorama Dajt.

Description:
Loced right on the beach in Golem, Hotel Monaco & Garden boasts a restaurant with a sea view terrace and offers air-conditioned accommodation. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on site.

All units come with a flat-screen TV and a seating area, as well as a safe and a minibar. Private bathrooms include a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Most rooms feature a balcony with either sea or garden views.

Guests can relax on the hotel beach includes free-to-use parasols and sun chairs. The hotel restaurant serves local and international delicacies, with a focus on Mediterranean and Italian food.

Tirana Airport is 44 km from the property, while Durres is 16 km from Hotel Monaco & Garden. Tirana can be reached in 43 km. Description: Aleks Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Velipoje area. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 24-hour security, private check in/check out, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are there for guest's enjoyment. Cleaning products, clothes rack, linens, mirror, private entrance can be found in selected guestrooms. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including children's playground. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Velipoje, Aleks Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.

Description: Set in a prime location of Velipoje, Hotel Mesdheu puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Hotel Mesdheu. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature cleaning products, clothes rack, linens, mirror, private entrance. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including water park, children's playground, kids club, garden, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Velipoje, Hotel Mesdheu will make you feel instantly at home.

Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, air conditioning, heating, mini bar, balcony/terrace. Description: Inheritor Resort is conveniently located in the popular Shengjin area. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, kitchen, 24-hour front desk. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find closet, cleaning products, towels, clothes rack, slippers. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as boats, canoe, water park, private beach, outdoor pool. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Inheritor Resort.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Cobo Winery

Location : A stay at Hotel Orestiada places you in the heart of Berat, within a 15-minute walk of Cobo Winery and Ethnographic Museum. This hotel is 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Onufri Museum and 1.5 mi (2.5 km) from Berat Castle.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 7 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel s coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM.

  • This property accepts credit cards

If you are planning to arrive after 9:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a sauna and an ATM.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms have a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options.

Gloria Palace Hotel & SPA offers 5-star accommodation with a spa centre.

Located in Tirana and with Skanderbeg Square reachable within 100 metres, La Voglia Hotel Boutique provides express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. 5 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car and 800 metres from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, the property features a shared lounge and a casino. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

All rooms are modernly furnished with contemporary colorful decor. Free private parking is offered for those who drive. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a microwave, a coffee machine, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel every room is equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom.

A buffet breakfast is available daily at La Voglia Hotel Boutique.

The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation.

Popular points of interest near La Voglia Hotel Boutique include Rinia Park, Ethem Bey Mosque and National Gallery of Arts Tirana. Description:
Situated in Golem, a few steps from Mali I Robit Beach, Max Royal G features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 1.2 km from Qerret Beach, 1.5 km from Golem Beach and 48 km from Skanderbeg Square. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

The rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some units at the hotel have a balcony.

A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property.

Max Royal G offers 5-star accommodation with an indoor pool.

Rock of Kavaje is 6.2 km from the accommodation, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 42 km from Max Royal G. A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Address: Bulevardi Pishat e buta 2504 Golem, Albania
Description:
Situated in Golem, a few steps from Mali I Robit Beach, Max Royal G features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. The 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a balcony. All rooms in Max Royal G are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Qerret Beach is 500 metres from Max Royal G, while Golem Beach is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 36 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Located in Tirana, 3.7 km from Skanderbeg Square, Radisson Collection Morina Hotel, Tirana provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests also enjoy access to the indoor pool and sauna, as well as the hot tub and hammam.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Radisson Collection Morina Hotel, Tirana every room has bed linen and towels.

A continental, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Steakhouse cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 8.5 km from Radisson Collection Morina Hotel, Tirana, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

Address: 17 Rruga George W. Bush Tirana  Albania
Description:
Situated in Tirana and with Skanderbeg Square reachable within 500 metres, The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. At The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or Italian options.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

Popular points of interest near The Crown Boutique Hotel & SPA include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, Toptani Shopping Centre and National Gallery of Arts Tirana. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Description:
Situated in Tirana, 4.8 km from Skanderbeg Square, Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an indoor pool and a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa the rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or American breakfast.

Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar.

Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 8.7 km from Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa, while Former Residence of Enver Hoxha is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 10 km from the hotel. Please inform Doanesia Premium Hotel & Spa in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

Description:
Located near the centre of Tirana, Apartments Kaloj offers free Wi-Fi. A cafe and snack bar is present on the propertys ground floor and guests can use the free barbecue facilities.

Each accommodation unit comes with air conditioning. Free private parking is available on site.

Bars, cafes and various restaurants can be found within a 200-metre radius. Skanderberg Square with its green promenades is 1 km from Kaloj Apartments.

The Pyramid monument and the Block area famous for night clubs can be reached with a 10-minute walk. Tirana Airport is 15 km away. Please inform Apartments Kaloj in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Central Apartments Shoshi is a self-catering accommodation located in Tirana, a 5-minute walk from the main square. The property is 1 km from Vodafone Tower. Free WiFi access is available.

Accommodation will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. The private bathroom has a shower and a hairdryer.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out National Arts Gallery (500 metres) and National Theatre of Opera and Ballet (700 metres).Tirana Airport is located 13 km away. The property offers free parking upon request. Please inform Central Apartments Shoshi in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Description:

Description:
Located in a quiet residential area near Elbasani Street, Pandora Residence Apartments features free WiFi and free private parking.. The property is just steps away from the Grand Park which houses the Artificial Lake, the Amphitheatre and the Botanic Garden.

Featuring modern interiors with marble floor, each apartment is equipped with a full kitchen and dining area. There is also a seating area with a flat-screen TV, as well as a private bathroom, in each unit.

The property runs a 24-hour front desk, and is 500 metres from several restaurants that serve various cuisines. The Archaeological Museum, the Pyramid, Skanderbeg Square, the National Museum, the Ethem Bey Mosque and the Clock Tower can all be reached with a 15-minute walk.

A public bus stop with lines to the centre is right next to the property. The nearest airport is Tirana Airport, 20 km from the property. Please inform Pandora Residence Apartments in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Food & beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Description:
Featuring mountain views, Galeria Apartment provides accommodation with a shared lounge and a balcony, around 4.7 km from Dajti Ekspres Cable Car. The air-conditioned accommodation is 500 metres from Skanderbeg Square, and guests benefit from private parking available on site and free WiFi.

Providing a terrace and city views, the apartment includes 1 bedroom, a living room, satellite flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment.

Description:
Its a brand new building and it renovates the apartments every year. It has a nice bar outside, a volley field and a pool table. there is a big parking area which is free of charge for our clients. Set just 500 metres from the beach, Hotel Bora Bora velipoja is 1 km from the centre of Velipoje. Built in 2011, it offers and on-site bar with a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a flat-screen satellite TV.

All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Some accommodation units also comprise a kitchenette and a furnished balcony.

Currency exchange is available on site. Various restaurants serving traditional Albanian cuisine, Italian and international dishes can be found in the vicinity. The nearest grocery store is 30 metres away.

Bike and car rental can be organised on site. Excursions to Shkodra, Lezha and Kruja, as well as hiking, biking and fishing can be organised at the hotel. Karaoke and evening entertainment are also provided.

A bus station is 700 metres away. Shengjin Port is 35 km from the Hotel Bora Bora velipoja. Tirana Airport is at a distance of 93 km. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Boasting garden views, Holiday Home 2 Palma features accommodation with a patio and a coffee machine, around 2.2 km from Ohana Beach. This holiday home offers free private parking and a shared kitchen.

Offering a terrace and pool views, the holiday home includes 2 bedrooms, a living room, cable flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a shower. The property also has 2 bathrooms with a hairdryer.

Speaking German, English, Italian and Albanian, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

The holiday home offers a barbecue. After a day of hiking or fishing, guests can relax in the garden or in the shared lounge area.

Skanderbeg Square is 41 km from Holiday Home 2 Palma, while Dajti Ekspres Cable Car is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa, 33 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Featuring a garden and barbecue facilities, Beautiful and relaxing *Villa* in Paftal, Berat features accommodation in Berat with free WiFi and city views. Boasting free private parking, the apartment is in an area where guests can engage in activities such as hiking, fishing and darts.

The apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hairdryer.

If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 122 km from the apartment. Please inform Beautiful and relaxing *Villa* in Paftal, Berat in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Managed by a private host

Description:
Boasting city views, Entire nice apartment, in the center features accommodation with a shared lounge and a balcony, around 500 metres from Skanderbeg Square. Featuring mountain and pool views, this apartment also comes with free WiFi.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet and a shower. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player, as well as a computer and a laptop are available.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Former Residence of Enver Hoxha, House of Leaves and Clock Tower Tirana. Description:
Set 2.9 km from Durres Beach, Currila Apartments 1 offers a bar, and accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.

All units here are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV, a living room with a sofa, a well-equipped kitchen with a dining area, and a private bathroom with bidet, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also offered, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine.

Port of Durres is 6 km from the apartment, while Rock of Kavaje is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Airport Mother Teresa Airport, 26 km from Currila Apartments 1.

HotelName: Elona's apartment 10 mins to city center
Address: Fadil Rada Pallati Daniela Hyrja B Kati 3 Apartamenti 12
Description:
Set in Tirana, 1 km from Skanderbeg Square, 4 km from Dajti Express and 1.3 km from Sky Tower, Elonas Apartment 10 mins to city center provides accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This apartment is 3 km from National Sport Park.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom. Guests wishing to travel lightly can make use of towels and linens for an additional supplement.

A car rental service is available at this property and cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

National Theatre of Opera and Ballet is 800 metres from the apartment, while National Arts Gallery is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 19 km from Elonas Apartment. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
 A damage deposit of EUR 50 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
For short term rentals the damage deposit is 50 euro. For Longer stays (4 weeks or longer) the damage deposit is 100 euro. The Damage Deposit will be refunded the day of check out after a quick
inspection of the property.

Description:
Situated in Tirana, within 2.9 km of Skanderbeg Square and 7.6 km of Dajti Ekspres Cable Car, Hotel Vila Tirana features accommodation with a shared lounge and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Former Residence of Enver Hoxha.

At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. The rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Hotel Vila Tirana have a balcony. All rooms have a safety deposit box.

Rock of Kavaje is 43 km from the accommodation, while Pyramid of Tirana is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 14 km from Hotel Vila Tirana. Description:
The hotel is conveniently situated in the centre of Berat, overlooking both Berat Castle and the old quarter of Gorica. Osum River is just a half-hour walk or a 4-minute drive away. Places of interest include the Church of St. Mary of Blachernae, which is inside Berat Castle and dates back to the 13th century. Tirana International Airport is about 82 km away.

This small, air-conditioned city hotel has spectacular views and offers 24 rooms. Amenities include a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, currency exchange facilities and a TV lounge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar and dine in the restaurant. Both wireless Internet access and parking are available. Guests can make use of the laundry services and the hotel also has wheelchair access.

All rooms feature a shower, bath and hairdryer, as well as a double bed, satellite/cable TV, a hifi and Internet access. Additional amenities include a safe, a minibar, a fridge, air conditioning, central heating and a balcony.

A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

Description:
The hotel is located very close to centre of Berat, less than 2 km (about 20 minutes' walk) away. Tirana is 127 km from the hotel. The nearby airport, Kucove Airport, is only 10.8 km away.

The architecture of the hotel is typical of the communist style, surrounded by tall palm trees. Built in 1975, the hotel offers guests 30 years' experience of service and tradition. The view from the terrace on the top floor, overlooking the old Mangalemi and Gorica districts, is spectacular.

The hotel provides convenient accommodation units.

Description:
Hotel Berati is located in the historical centre of Berati, just a few minutes away from all major attractions. It offers a restaurant and bar that serves traditional meals, while free Wi-Fi and free parking are included.

Rooms are air-conditioned and fitted with simple furnishings, satellite TV and a wardrobe. Private bathroom provides a shower. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available upon request.

The closest supermarket can be found 20 metres away. Historic sights such as the Old Town and the The Lead Mosque can be reached in a 2-minute walk. The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be found 500 metres away.

Guests can also find the Tomorri National Park 60 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Berati Hotel. Local buses stop just a few steps away, while Tirana and the international airport are 110 km from the property. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

Description:
Featuring an on-site restaurant, Hotel Muzaka is right next to the river Osum and 500 metres from the centre of Berat. Set in a traditional building, it offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The UNESCO-listed Berat Castle is 1.5 km away.

Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels. Some rooms are decorated with wooden beams.

At Hotel Muzakas restaurant guests can enjoy their breakfast and Italian cuisine. A terrace and a bar are also available.

The nearest grocery store and a bus station are 500 metres away. Excursions to Bogova Waterfall, Tomor Mountain and rafting on Osum River can be arranged in local agencies. Free on-site parking is provided.

Description:
Hotel Klea is in the Castle of Berat, just 40 meters from the main gate. Set in a traditional house, it offers free WiFi access in public areas and a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace.

All rooms include air conditioning, a TV and a desk as well as a bathroom with a bathtub and a shower.

The on-site restaurant of Hotel Klea serves traditional homemade dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include grocery deliveries, a shared lounge and a tour desk.

An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including hiking. Free private parking is available on site and Tirana Airport is 81 km away.

Each room here will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy city view from the room.

Hotel Belgrad Mangalem is housed in 2 historical buildings, placed 10 metres from each other. You will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage.

The Berat Castle, dating back to the 13th century, can be reached in just 500 metres. Guests can also visit the Tomorri National Park, 22 km away, while rafting on Osum River can be enjoyed 50 km from Hotel Belgrad.

The property offers free parking. Tirana Airport is 82 km away. Please inform Hotel Belgrad Mangalem in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Situated in Berat, Guest House Vasili provides a bar and free WiFi. There is free private parking and the property features paid airport shuttle service.

At the guest house, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, the rooms at Guest House Vasili have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels.

The nearest airport is Tirana International Mother Teresa Airport, 117 km from Guest House Vasili. Please inform Guest House Vasili in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
